message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still can't justify paying $13,000 for this product. My maximum remains at $12,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.
